phrases: Hi! My name is Nikita Isay, I am a tech person with experience in software development.
I'm interested in front-end, back-end development and blockchain technologies. I really serious about creating useful and scalable software products, powered by modern technologies.
This is my personal blog where I share my knowledges with everyone who  also interested in software development.
main.quote: One of my qualities is a strong desire to learn. Personal development is about challenging yourself. You can never see any improvements if you stick to your comfort zone. If you stop growing, you drown.

companies.description: As a front-end developer at Madappgang, I've developed different web sites and web applications. I took a part in developing admin panel and web app for project with its own unique system of managing restaurant's orders and business. Also I've developed a Madappgang corporate website. I took a part in the developing project that helps track personal goals progress of each company employee  and organanize task planning proccess. I worked with different modern technologies during this period, such as JavaScript, Typescript, React, Redux and etc.

As a node.js developer at SPD-Ukraine, I am working at Poynt. It is an all-in-one payment platform, offers diverse benefits to businesses, with its contactless, fast, secure, and safe payment processing solution. Poynt is powered by GoDaddy. I am taking a part in the developing proccess of front-end and back-end parts of the project

about_me.quote:
Concern for man and his fate must always form the chief interest of all technical endeavors.
Never forget this in the midst of your diagrams and equations.
